PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1996-08021996-05-280,  ,  ,  COM, 
PrecisApproval of amendments made by the Public Service Commission to the PUBLIC SERVICE OFFICIAL LANGUAGES EXCLUSION APPROVAL ORDER which simplify the rules respecting access to language training and standardize the two-year exemption period during which public servants may occupy a bilingual position without meeting the language requirements.
RegistrationRegistration: SI / 1996-0048 Publication Date: 1996-06-12
